tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Tekkit Part 29 - Nerd Poles
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: After a nice sleep, the boys discuss the next steps of the factory construction and have a little trouble with engines and pipes! Sjin's Channel: www.youtube.com Duncan's Channel: www.youtube.com Sips's Channel: www.youtube.com Tekkit Download: www.technicpack.net Textures: bdcraft.net ● Yogscast Gear: yogscast.spreadshirt.co.uk ● Facebook: www.facebook.com ● Twitter: www.twitter.com ● Forums: yogscast.com ● Podcast: itunes.apple.com ● Powered by Chillblast: www.chillblast.com ● PO Box: The Yogscast, PO Box 3125, Bristol, BS2 2DG

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Yeah, hey seriously need to go explore that pagoda and that weird ass tree thing﻿ next to it...
in that case use your﻿ own sh*t to power the factory

Hey please come check out my channel I have﻿ some great Minecraft videos and I am looking for advice and if you﻿ guys could give me some suggestions for ideas for future videos that would be awesome!! If you like my videos please click like and if﻿ you want more please subscribe so I know! Thanks a lot!
Well﻿ that escalated quickly
does no one else see that giant﻿ house which we have no idea how it got there!
Check﻿ out﻿ my small nice server﻿﻿ :D 108.60.137.122:25591﻿
Actually, the game is﻿ Minecraft and the mod is called Tekkit, or the Technic Pack.
*Immediately. xD﻿
Doing﻿ what
is this an old tekkit version cause in the﻿ newest one uranium is half a diamond #
like this if﻿ you watch this everyday
nvm﻿
flagged?﻿
It's a mod pack called﻿ the technic pack. and they are playing the multiplayer version called Tekkit :)

No one is probably going to read this but I will write it﻿ anyways because i feel that at least ONE person will Im a commentator. I know that there is alot of others, but again Im different I promise that.. If you give me a chance ill show you. I would love nothing more than to have a decent amount of followers on YouTube If anyone who reads this could press the THUMBS UP so other people will see it. Just a simple press of a button can make my dream come true. Thank You.
Hey all you guys who where being mean to me I just said that because I thought﻿ u guys would want to see the japeneese house
You were up all﻿ night doing Lewis ?
>_> are you serious﻿ or just trolling
GET﻿ ON THE POLE TROLL TOTEM POLE SPREAD BACK THE ANUS AND INSERT THE POLE!

Need a game ?!
Free $10 PSN, XBLA, Apple, Amazon Gift Card!
No strings attached get as many as you want!
Step 1: Go to the App Store and download App﻿ Trailers
Step 2: Enter freeappleten into the "Enter Promotional Code" section of the Videos tab.
Step 3: Redeem $10 Gift Card of your choice
Step 4: Wait for email with redemption code
Don't believe it ?? Sucks to be you.

Hey guys I love your videos and I was wondering if you can﻿ tell the owner of the server if he can add me to the whitelist because I'm a mature grown man that enjoys you videos so if you can do that favor i will give you guys a favor to like work day and night in minecraft terms not real life sincerely, Steve Cordero or also known as CREEPERSLAYER55
ok... what's with the random pagoda?﻿
...tekkit is a mod﻿ pack you dumbshit
Where is﻿ he?
it is an open server that all of the Yogscast use. Sjin and Sips build on another area and Duncan builds and has a lets play a ways﻿ away from there
